title: PTD Today — Media
disclaimer: Informational only — AI-generated summaries; may contain errors. Verify with the original video.

items.title: re:Invent 2025 - Chalk Talk - Origin management for multi-region applications with Amazon CloudFront

ai.summary: Based on the available description, this session explains origin management with Amazon CloudFront for secure, resilient multi-region content delivery. It covers automatic failover with CloudFront and Route 53, granular origin routing using CloudFront Functions, securing origins with S3 Origin Access Control and VPC private origins, hybrid integration via AWS Direct Connect, and using Origin Shield to improve cache performance and reduce origin load.
bullets: Automatic failover and resiliency using CloudFront together with Route 53
Granular origin routing and traffic control with CloudFront Functions
Origin security using S3 Origin Access Control (OAC) and VPC private origins
Hybrid on-premises integration through AWS Direct Connect
Cache optimization and origin load reduction with Origin Shield
takeaways: Plan for built-in multi-region resiliency by pairing CloudFront failover with Route 53 to minimize downtime
Use CloudFront Functions for fine-grained origin routing to control traffic distribution across regions or origins
Protect backend infrastructure by enforcing S3 OAC or deploying VPC private origins to reduce exposure
Consider AWS Direct Connect for secure, reliable connectivity when integrating on-premises systems with CloudFront
Deploy Origin Shield to centralize cache hits and decrease load on origin servers, improving performance and efficiency

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… Podcast KPMG ON AIR przedstawia praktyczne zastosowania AI w audycie, omawiając narzędzia takie jak AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI oraz platformę KPMG Clara. Rozmówczynie wyjaśniają korzyści dla klientów, zmiany w roli audytora, kluczowe kompetencje oraz wyzwania związane z wdrożeniem, bezpieczeństwem danych i regulacjami.
bullets: AI wspiera powtarzalne czynności, analizę dużych zbiorów danych i podejmowanie decyzji.
AI Transaction Scoring Tool umożliwia analizę pełnych populacji zamiast próbkowania.
Clara AI działa jako konwersacyjny asystent i zestaw wyspecjalizowanych agentów.
Platforma KPMG Clara zapewnia zarządzanie badaniem w czasie rzeczywistym; Clara for Clients ułatwia komunikację z klientem.
W rozmowie poruszono także wyzwania wdrożeniowe, bezpieczeństwo danych i aspekty regulacyjne oraz potencjalne zagrożenia AI.
takeaways: Pełnopopulacyjna analiza zwiększa poziom zapewnienia z audytu — warto przygotować dane tak, by umożliwić takie analizy.
Automatyzacja rutynowych zadań przyspiesza proces audytu i zmniejsza zakłócenia operacyjne podczas kontroli.
Platformy do zarządzania badaniem w czasie rzeczywistym mogą skrócić czas reakcji i usprawnić komunikację z audytorami.
Przed udostępnieniem danych audytorom należy zweryfikować polityki bezpieczeństwa i zgodność z regulacjami.
Inwestycje w kompetencje związane z danymi i AI u zespołów wewnętrznych ułatwiają współpracę z audytem opartym na AI.

items.title: AI at Speed: From Investment to Performance

ai.summary: Based on the available description… PwC US Senior Partner and CEO Paul Griggs speaks with CNBC’s Emma Crosby at the 2026 World Economic Forum in Davos about how organizations are shifting from AI exploration to execution and assessing initiatives through investment discipline, performance, and measurable value. They highlight that leading organizations move early, place capital with intent, and design operating models that are resilient without sacrificing performance while AI already delivers measurable outcomes and supports broader transformation.
bullets: Shift from AI exploration to execution with a focus on investment discipline and measurable value.
Leading organizations move early and allocate capital with clear intent.
Operating models are being designed for resilience without compromising performance.
AI is delivering measurable outcomes today while enabling longer-term transformation.
Discussion took place at WEF 2026 between PwC US CEO Paul Griggs and CNBC’s Emma Crosby.
takeaways: Prioritize AI investments that can demonstrate measurable value and performance.
Allocate capital early and with clear intent to capture strategic advantage.
Design operating models that balance resilience and performance for AI workloads.
Measure outcomes from AI deployments to justify investment and guide transformation.

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Copilot provides real-time visual support for home projects and repairs. It can "see what you see" and deliver step-by-step, clearly worded instructions for issues ranging from leaky pipes to overflowing washing machines.
bullets: Real-time visual support for home projects and repairs
Copilot can "see what you see" to understand the problem context
Delivers step-by-step instructions for common issues
Examples include leaky pipes and overflowing washing machines
Emphasizes clear, actionable guidance during troubleshooting
takeaways: So what: The described real-time, visual, step-by-step guidance could be evaluated for applicability to facility or equipment maintenance workflows.
So what: A "see what you see" capability may enable remote experts to provide contextual instructions without being onsite.
So what: Clear, procedural guidance suggests potential to standardize routine repair tasks and support less-experienced technicians.
So what: Decision-makers should assess integration considerations such as safety, compliance, and training before adopting similar tools.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer - Launching January 22!

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Arknights: Endfield launches worldwide on January 22 and features NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The game is a 3D real-time strategy RPG where you play the Endministrator exploring Talos-II, and the trailer was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra with DLSS 4 MFG 4X Mode.
bullets: Worldwide release date: January 22.
Features NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation.
Game type: 3D real-time strategy RPG (player is Endministrator of Endfield Industries on Talos-II).
Trailer capture details: GeForce RTX 5080, 4K Ultra, DLSS 4 MFG 4X Mode.
Links provided for more info and official social channels.
takeaways: Title supports NVIDIA DLSS 4 MFG — validate driver and SDK compatibility when provisioning GPU servers or workstations.
Trailer uses an RTX 5080 for 4K capture — use equivalent GPU class for accurate QA, capture, or streaming reproduction.
Ensure infrastructure (GPU capacity, drivers, capture pipelines) can handle 4K workloads with advanced AI upscaling enabled.

Signals a collaboration between Google Cloud and Salesforce that may be relevant when evaluating cloud+CRM solutions.
Serves as a short case study reference to inform procurement or pilot discussions without technical specifics.

items.title: I Travel The World And Live Rent-Free By Pet Sitting Full Time

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Charly Stoever, 35, is a financial coach who has been pet sitting full time to live rent-free in Portland, Oregon. Over the past 18 months she’s lived out of two suitcases while earning $60,000 a year, as profiled in CNBC Make It’s Millennial Money series.
bullets: Charly Stoever, 35, is a financial coach who pet sits full time to avoid rent.
She lives in Portland, Oregon, and has spent 18 months living out of two suitcases.
Her reported annual income from this lifestyle is $60,000.
This profile appears in CNBC Make It’s Millennial Money series.
Video credits include producer Lauren Shamo and reporter Ryan Ermey.
takeaways: Anecdote shows a growing segment of mobile, location-flexible earners whose lifestyles may influence demand for ubiquitous connectivity and reliable digital services.
Consistency of income from nontraditional work arrangements highlights the need to design infrastructure with flexibility for distributed users.
Profiles of nomadic, low-footprint living underscore potential value in edge and resilient services that support remote, transient users.
Understanding evolving work/lifestyle trends can help forecast shifts in peak usage patterns and infrastructure provisioning needs.

items.title: How I earn $900,000 a year as a dermatologist

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Dr. Anna Chacon, 39, is a dermatologist in Miami who runs a private practice. Her estimated net worth is about $6 million, made up of $3.2 million in investments, a $1.9 million home, and a $1.1 million office building.
bullets: Dr. Anna Chacon is a 39-year-old dermatologist based in Miami, FL.
She operates her own private dermatology practice.
Estimated total net worth: approximately $6 million.
$3.2 million held in investments.
Real estate holdings include a $1.9 million home and a $1.1 million office building.
takeaways: Ownership of an office building suggests commercial energy and infrastructure needs that may demand reliable power and resilience planning.
Medical practices can have equipment and operational demands that benefit from backup power and stable connectivity.
High-net-worth professionals with mixed investment and real estate portfolios can be stakeholders in local infrastructure and utility planning.

items.title: New CO2 Battery Stores 8 Hours of Energy

ai.summary: Based on the available description, a new carbon dioxide "bubble" battery is described as able to store 20 megawatts of energy and provide about eight hours of energy. The description says these batteries are intended to smooth fluctuations from renewable resources and help power the global shift to clean energy.
bullets: Described as a giant carbon dioxide "bubble" battery
Claims to store 20 megawatts of energy
Title indicates roughly 8 hours of energy storage
Aimed at addressing fluctuating renewable energy sources
Positioned to support a global shift to clean energy (per description)
takeaways: Eight hours of storage at a 20 MW scale suggests potential for multi-hour backup or load-shifting applications relevant to grid operators and large facilities.
The technology is framed as a tool to smooth renewable intermittency, so it may factor into plans for higher renewable penetration.
Description lacks deployment, cost, and detailed technical specs—decision-makers will need those specifics before procurement or integration decisions.

items.title: AI w cenach transferowych – jak wykorzystać jej potencjał? | Monika Palmowska, Jakub Roszkiewicz

ai.summary: Based on the available description, KPMG tax experts Monika Palmowska and Jakub Roszkiewicz discuss how AI is already changing transfer pricing—from monitoring profitability and comparative analyses to automating documentation—and how it is likely to evolve. They emphasize that AI will strengthen, not replace, advisors, and cover implementation steps, ERP integration, risks around data/security and GDPR, and the role of secure environments like Digital Gateway.
bullets: AI use cases in transfer pricing: monitoring rentowności, benchmarking, automatyzacja dokumentacji.
AI as augmentation: wspiera doradców i rozwój kompetencji młodszych pracowników, nie zastępuje ich.
Ryzyka: dane, bezpieczeństwo, halucynacje i zgodność z RODO—wymagane bezpieczne środowiska (np. Digital Gateway).
Techniczne aspekty: integracja AI z ERP i tworzenie inteligentnych benchmarków.
Wdrożenie: zacząć od uporządkowania procesów, definiowania person i kolejnych kroków transformacji.
takeaways: Zastosuj AI do monitorowania rentowności i alokacji kosztów, by lepiej planować inwestycje i operacje centrów danych.
Zanim wdrożysz AI, zabezpiecz dane i zapewnij zgodność z RODO; rozważ użycie kontrolowanego środowiska pracy (Digital Gateway).
Upewnij się, że ERP jest zintegrowany i że procesy są uporządkowane, aby AI mogła dostarczać wiarygodne benchmarki i automatyzacje.
Skup się na szkoleniu zespołu: AI ma wzmacniać kompetencje pracowników i doradców, nie zastępować ich decyzji.

items.title: Stack small wins with Microsoft Copilot

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Copilot is presented as a tool to help maintain momentum across activities. Whether for workouts, projects, or personal goals, the message encourages using Copilot to keep progress moving forward.
bullets: Encourages sustaining momentum rather than one-off bursts.
Applies across workouts, projects, and personal goals.
Positions Copilot as a productivity/motivation aid.
Simple, general messaging focused on continued progress.
takeaways: Sustaining momentum is relevant to long-running infrastructure projects and operational initiatives.
Using a consistent assistive tool could help teams keep progress on milestones and deliverables.
Maintaining steady progress supports scheduling and reducing last-minute risk during deployments.
Aiding individual productivity can help decision-makers balance strategic planning with day-to-day operations.
